message.content:
{"id": "2694", "title": "Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions", "description": "When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors in the Editor Selection Dialog, there are some UI suggestions:
a. Enable multiple selection.
b. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

Additional notes:
- KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM): Also, the dialog needs a width hint and why does the File editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?
- KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM): Fixes for a, c, f, and g have been released.
", "OB": "'Add' button adds a hidden entry.", "EB": "Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.", "SR": "Make sure that when a user presses 'Add', a hidden entry is not added. Additionally, ensure that entries already existing in the associated editors are not available for selection."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

Need a width hint for the dialogg. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pagesdo the same?I currently have fixes for a, c, fNeed to releaseKLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)released fixes for a, c, f, g ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "'Add' should not add a hidden entry.d. Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selectione. ", 'SR': ''}
